{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Djembe Studios|It|Djembe Studios}} is a musical instrument store run by [[Anchieta]]. Each of the instruments holds some sentimental value to him, so he tries to create a calm, stress-free environment to prevent impulsive purchases.<noinclude><ref>{{Ref/NPC|Anchieta}}</ref><ref>{{Ref/Furnishing|Hot Spring Retreat: Go With the Flow}}</ref></noinclude></p>}}
